WRITING.TEXT:
When I started 0-3, I thought my playoff hopes were all but over. The Loins of McCloin are battle tested now. I need A-A-Ron and the sneaky good Redskin O to keep rolling for a couple more weeks.
Here's the final standings for League #2 http://imgur.com/gallery/q5eNlZr
THE 5 SACK MACKS (robert) are the worst team. There were a couple of teams with the same records but I awarded to the macks because they scored the least amount of points.

http://imgur.com/sKUYJay Standing in League #2, sorry everyone I didn't realize I was suppose to doing this all season...The Loins of McCloin have come out of the mud to be playoff bound. Thank you Jordan Reed.
I'm concerned about the players getting gassed quick.
I can only assume they didn't have that camera angle.
No rest for the wicked in the AFC West.

WRITING.TITLE: How many wins would it take to get to the playoffs?
WRITING.TEXT: Last Friday after the Dbags game, my friend and I were going through the schedule and theorizing about possible win-lose record to get into the playoff. We thought they would need to go 10-18 to finish the season. They're 1-2 now. How many wins do you think they need to get into the playoff?
With the recent news i think it worked.
Channel the Raiders collective consciousness to heal Mario.
Thank you sir. Got signed up.

I don't think people would disagree with the points in the article but it's hilarious that is "mandatory". This what they focus on? I would love to see the amount of time and money that will spent on this initiative.
